content: I've implemented a fix for #90024 and tested it against all the reported ICEs (in that issue and in duplicates). I'd like to actually add a test to the test suite, but I'm not sure what the right mechanism is since all the MCVEs require cargo fix --edition to show up. Do I need to add this test to rustfix? Seems awkward, since the actual bug was definitely in rustc

@Jake https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/src/test/ui/closures/2229_closure_analysis/migrations/insignificant_drop_attr_migrations.rs is an example of what a test would look like. That engages the migration warning, and runs rustfix to make sure the fix applies correctly.
That's very helpful, thanks so much! I'll write the test and add it to the PR in just a minute
